description: Board/strategic level scenarios. Unlocks after Leader L3 (L3 다음 단계).

items.macro_environment: DSO consolidation accelerating nationwide. PE valuations peak at 12x EBITDA.
items.trigger_event: PE firm offers to acquire 60% equity stake with 3-year expansion mandate.
items.board_composition: 7 founding partners, 3 next-gen partners, 1 independent advisor
items.motion_proposal: Accept majority sale to fund aggressive 3-year expansion.

coalition_options.argument: Secure liquidity now while valuation is high.
Retain autonomy to build generational institution.

vote_scenarios.outcome: Capital increases, governance shifts to PE-controlled board seats.
Group remains independent, slower expansion trajectory.

five_year_projection.if_pass: Rapid expansion to 35 offices, EBITDA growth, but reduced internal autonomy.
five_year_projection.if_fail: Organic growth to 22 offices, stronger cultural cohesion.

items.identity_shift: Asset platform vs. generational professional group.

items.macro_environment: Internal strategic speed slowing due to equal-vote partner structure.
items.trigger_event: Multiple delayed strategic decisions due to voting deadlock.
items.motion_proposal: Create CEO role with unilateral authority on operational decisions.

vote_scenarios.outcome: Strategic speed improves; power asymmetry increases.
Shared governance maintained; decision latency persists.

items.identity_shift: Corporate governance model vs. professional partnership collective.

items.macro_environment: Founders nearing retirement phase; next-gen leadership emerging.
items.trigger_event: Two founders signal reduced involvement over next 3 years.
items.board_composition: 5 senior founders, 4 mid-career partners, 2 emerging leaders.
items.motion_proposal: Gradual 5-year voting transition to next-generation partners.

vote_scenarios.outcome: Short-term stability, long-term succession shock risk.
